entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:01 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
